docs.text:
Welcome !


I am a graduate student of the Geophysics Program in the Earth, Atmospheric and Planetary Sciences (
EAPS
) department at MIT.


My work, supervised by 
Michel Campillo
, focuses on the development of methods for automatic earthquake detection. I am particularly interested in studying how the large amount of seismic data can be processed with modern techniques emerging from machine learning.


Other Websites




Research Gate


GitHub


Google Scholar




Contact Information


ebeauce@mit.edu


77 Massachusetts Avenue


Building 54 - office 527


Cambridge, MA, 02139


USA
